name: Over Yonder
description: The avid hiker's companion, this app makes use of geolocation and the REI Hike Project API to generate a list of hikes based on user input.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app that makes use of the OpenWeather API.

name: My Familiar
description: An app for creating, updating, and maintaining Dungeons and Dragons characters. The app uses node.JS and Express, MySQL for data persitence, and Socket.IO for a real-time chat app.

name: Team Template Engine
description: A command line program that uses ES6 classes to create an HTML page for a work team based on input received from inquirer.
